about_the_game:
Market Empire Simulator puts you in the role of a rising market owner, where your business skills and strategy will determine your success. Build, manage, and optimize your very own supermarket from the ground up.

Run Your Own Supermarket

Start with a modest store and turn it into the go-to shopping destination. Control everything from inventory to pricing, ensuring customers leave satisfied and keep coming back.

Hire and Manage Employees

Find the right staff to keep your store running smoothly. Hire employees and maintain morale to maximize productivity.

Stock Your Shelves Wisely

Choose the right products and arrange them strategically to attract customers. From everyday essentials to specialty items.

Expand and Upgrade

Upgrade your store with better equipment, more shelves, and a bigger layout.

Customize and Optimize

Design your store’s layout for peak efficiency or focus on aesthetics to create a welcoming shopping experience. Every detail matters when it comes to running a thriving supermarket.

Do you have what it takes to build the ultimate shopping empire? The challenge awaits in Market Empire Simulator!

Start with a modest store and turn it into the go-to shopping destination. Control everything from inventory to pricing, ensuring customers leave satisfied and keep coming back.

Choose the right products and arrange them strategically to attract customers. From everyday essentials to specialty items.

Upgrade your store with better equipment, more shelves, and a bigger layout.

Design your store’s layout for peak efficiency or focus on aesthetics to create a welcoming shopping experience. Every detail matters when it comes to running a thriving supermarket.

Do you have what it takes to build the ultimate shopping empire? The challenge awaits in Market Empire Simulator!
name: Market Empire Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Memory: 8096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 8096 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Memory: 8096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 8096 MB available space

short_description: Market Empire Simulator is a business management game where you build, run, and optimize your own supermarket. Manage inventory, hire employees, stock shelves, and expand your store to create the ultimate shopping experience.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Turkish
